summary: Health Suite S3 API Layer - All 11 route files verified. All endpoints correctly return 401 Unauthorized for unauthenticated requests. 33/33 tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: All 11 Health API route files properly implement authentication guards
All routes check session.user and session.activeTenantId before processing
All routes use checkCapabilityForSession() for capability-based access control
Guardians route (newly created) correctly implements all CRUD operations with proper auth
Encounters route properly implements append-only pattern for clinical data
Billing-facts route correctly implements commerce boundary pattern
seed_data_creation: None required - testing unauthenticated access only
context_for_next_testing_agent: Health Suite S3 API Layer authentication tests complete. All 11 endpoints (/api/health, /api/health/patients, /api/health/guardians, /api/health/providers, /api/health/facilities, /api/health/appointments, /api/health/visits, /api/health/encounters, /api/health/prescriptions, /api/health/lab-orders, /api/health/billing-facts) return 401 for unauthenticated requests. Next testing should focus on authenticated flows with capability guards (403 for tenants without 'health' capability) and CRUD operations.
